objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#0A586B'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#20ADB3'/></linearGradient><filter id='noise' x='0%' y='0%' width='100%' height='100%'><feTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.01' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/><feBlend mode='soft-light' in='SourceGraphic'/></filter><radialGradient id='spotlight' cx='50%' cy='30%' r='70%' fx='50%' fy='30%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#30CDCD' stop-opacity='0.4'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#0A586B' stop-opacity='0'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#spotlight)'/><g opacity='0.15' filter='url(#noise)'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='white'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='180' cy='180' r='80' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='120' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='900' cy='180' r='50' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='180' cy='900' r='60' fill='#D4AF37'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><rect x='0' y='540' width='1080' height='1' fill='white'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='1' height='1080' fill='white'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='0.5'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='0.5'/></g><g opacity='0.05'><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='500' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/></g></svg>

objects.text: Indulge in Elegance, Unleash Your Charisma
Versatile unisex fragrance suitable for all occasions
Premium eau de toilette concentration for lasting freshness
Perfect for both daytime and evening wear

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Refreshing Luxury in Every Spray
product_details.description:
• Versatile unisex fragrance suitable for all occasions
• Premium eau de toilette concentration for lasting freshness
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size in an elegant bottle
• Sleek turquoise design with luxurious gold cap
• Professional-grade fragrance by BELLAVITA
• Modern and sophisticated packaging
• Perfect for both daytime and evening wear
• Ideal gift choice for any gender
• Travel-friendly size meets airline regulations
• Premium quality fragrance at competitive price

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sophisticated fragrance advertisement with a luxurious and refreshing theme. The background features a teal-blue radial gradient enhanced with soft noise textures and minimalistic circular design elements to add subtle depth. Centered is a prominent product image, drawing immediate focus to the unisex perfume bottle. The banner structure includes a bold uppercase header (`heading`) followed by a contrasting golden subheading (`subheading`) that introduces the product type. A stylish cursive tagline (`tagline`) adds elegance. Four center-aligned description texts (`description_1` to `description_4`) highlight the fragrance benefits. At the bottom, a strong golden price tag (`price`) and a vibrant gold rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with dark teal text (`cta`) drive purchase motivation.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Teal: #0A586B
- Turquoise Gradient: #20ADB3
- Gold: #D4AF37
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and refreshing color palette, centering around a dominant aqua blue tone (#08BDBA), symbolic of freshness and clarity. This smooth aqua tone covers the bottle entirely, making it visually striking and evoking a sense of coolness and unisex appeal. The golden cap (#D4AF37) adds a contrasting touch of elegance and luxury, giving the product a premium look. White typography (#FFFFFF) is used effectively for clarity and contrast against the blue background, making it easy to read while enhancing the clean aesthetic. Together, these colors blend softly yet stand out distinctly, perfect for a crisp, modern advertisement banner.
